page.title: 13Events round Ruan Minor 2
page.content: In the summer there is a Royal Wedding Sports Day.It is held on the anniversary of the Prince and Princess of Wales's wedding.It includes races like running races,bean bag races,three-legged races and lots more.Winners are given souvenirs with pictures of the Prince and Pricess of Wales on the front.Sometimes there is a summer fete in the recreation ground.There are lots of stalls with things to buy. Round about May 6th every year the Morris dancers are dancing again in Cadgwith pub. Every Christmas there is a Christmas party for the children that go to Grade Ruan primary school.First there are games in the Methodist Hall and then everybody goes into the Village Hall to eat.Later Father Christmas comes and gives everyone a present.
